Message.Msg: Guns are not the issue at all. He was being denied an education, and what he needed was people to get out of his way and let him get on with his life. What he did was apparently the only way he knew to remove some intolerable barriers from his life. Somebody needed to show him a more effective way.

Message.Title: ANDROID IS DEAD!!!!!!!!!
Message.Msg: GOOGLE IT Android Is Dead, Part 3: The Numbers December 20, 2012 | 14 commentsby: J. M. Manness | about: GOOG, includes: AAPL, MSFT, RIMM Disclosure: I am long AAPL. I wrote this article myself, and it expresses my own opinions. I am not receiving compensation for it (other than from Seeking Alpha). I have no business relationship with any company whose stock is mentioned in this article. (More...) Android is in its death throes! Well, this may be overstating a bit, but I do believe that the Smartphone OS landscape will be very different in 4 years - and that Android will be the loser. In part 1 I laid out my basic argument in two major points against Android: Security issues Upcoming competition In part 2 I noted corroborating analysis from a Goldman Sachs report titled Clash of the Titans, in which they foresee Android steadily losing market share. The crux of their argument is that the Android tablet entries have failed to gain traction in the enterprise, and that …we think the tablet will move into more of an anchor position, and will have increasing levels of influence on future smartphone purchases. For this reason they say (p 7) that Google (GOOG), i.e. Android: …runs the risk of platform defection resulting in a steady decline of Android smartphone share (estimated to be 55% in 2012) starting in CY13. While we are modeling 48% smartphone share for the Android in 2016, we note this number could prove optimistic… [emphasis added] Personally, I agree that their 48% number is very optimistic. Some Research I dug out IDC's projections for 2016 from early December. Their projection for Android is more optimistic than that of Goldman Sachs:

Topic.Title: Men Over 60 Ranting About Those G'Dam Hippies. Old men over 60 Like The Koch Bros.

Message.Msg: "Men Over 60 Ranting About Those G'Dam Hippies." FALSE! I am 62 and many of us over 60 *WERE* those hippies, even those such as myself that joined the military during the Vietnam conflict to do our duty as we saw it. "Old men over 60 Like The Koch Bros." FALSE! I am 62 and have never met the rascals. I do not care for the amount of influence they apparently have over some conservatives and don't believe that they should be able to so easily influence public policy of any kind. "Old men over 60 don't like environmentalists." FALSE I am 62 and have no issue with environmentalists as long as they adhere to and demonstrate sound science. "Old men over 60 don't like those kids with tattoos." FALSE! I am 62 and have children and a large number of friends that have tattoos. In fact, as I ride with a three piece patch MC with other vets, almost everyone I know as well as their ol' ladies have some tattoos, some brothers being fully "sleeved" and beautifully so. "Old men over 60 don't like those hispanic / black politicians." FALSE! I am 62 and believe that public office should be held by the capable and competent regardless of ethnicity. "Old men over 60 don't like it when the younger generation has a better life than they did." FALSE! I am 62 and believe as my father and his father before him that each ensuing generation should progressively be able attain and maintain a lifestyle superior to the one which I enjoy. "Old men over 60 are just old." FALSE! I am 62 and still perform the same physical fitness routines, lift the same weights and run the same extended mileage that I have since I was a young Marine at 18 years of age. "Old men over 60 like other old men over 60." "FALSE! I am 62 and like my 43 year old girlfriend and love all my 20 to 40 year old motorcycle club brothers that are recently retired or still on active duty as much as I love all my 60 and over peers. "Old men over 60 like Grover & The Koch Bros & guns & pain & suffering of others. That makes Old men over 60 happy." FALSE! I am 62 and that is the stupidest most uninformed hold of bilge water I have ever heard.

Topic.Title: Men Over 60 Ranting About Those G'Dam Hippies. Old men over 60 Like The Koch Bros.

Topic.Title: Ballmer on short list

Message.Msg: I'm just reporting the facts. I have been a stockholder for many years and Ballmer has done nothing to get the stock price up. In fact, he has made negative comments that drove the stock down more than once. As reported on the internet: "In fact, Ballmer has been selected as one of the worst CEOs of the year, but luckily for him, Andrew Mason of Groupon has managed to prove “his incompetence as a CEO” with several occasions. So why Ballmer, you may ask. It’s pretty simple, Greenberg explains. Windows 8 is yet to deliver that great performance everybody has been expecting, the company’s shares have fallen by more than 40 percent since he became CEO and Microsoft has spent quite a fortune on smaller startups that seem useless for the time being."

Topic.Title: Obama tax the millionaires and billionaires was another lie. Now its tax the Middle Class but wasn't that

Message.Msg: Where does he say he will now tax the middle class, I must have missed that one. He isn't a King you know, he can't just raise or lower tax by himself like you think. Last I checked millions is more than the 250K net income limit, so that also is a bit of a stretch to call his truth a lie. Millionaires are definitely in the category of getting their tax cut cancelled. 98% of the people make less. How far does your middle class definition reach? Oh well, have at it, whatever makes you happier about losing.
